website_summaries.verdict: Great for a variety of uses, these weights are best used for indoor, lower-impact uses.
pros: Good for surgery rehab, therapy, strength training and muscle building
Easily adjusts from ankle to wrist
Choice of pair of 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5 pound weights
cons: Can rub legs uncomfortably when used as ankle weights
If they do, try wearing longer socks

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality, item tore after 2 uses. Metal balls now everywhere in my living room for me to clean up! Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: AznYungztah

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality: the weights leak
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad at the beginning to finally settle on this product. However, the stitching broke open near the Velcro strap, causing microscopic beads to fall after minimal use. I'm disappointed in the product, and would not recommend it. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Bennie

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done Nicely
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for knee replacement rehab. The 3 lb. (6 lb. total) set is good to use in several applications of the workout. Applicable for upper body when used on wrists. Very well made. The Velcro and latch buckle keep the weights securely on. The trim is reflective for night use. The company's literature includes very supportive info. Proper adjustment of any exposed skin via socks, etc., will get rid of Velcro rub being a problem. Got this set on sale, hence excellent quality for a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, and easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: These are just as described. They are very comfortable, and easy to put on and take off, and there is plenty of room for adjustment. The carry bag keeps them neat and easy to carry. I use them as ankle weights in rehab for a knee replacement. The fact that they are guaranteed decided me on them, and they do seem to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: these are really good, I got them to give me a bit of extra workout when I play with Wii Gold's Gym Boxing, with all the punching I was doing, they stayed secured to my wrists and gave my arms and upper body a really good work out I am glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Ripped open after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: I had these weights for less than 2 months to use in my home gym and one of them tore wide open, pouring sand all over the place when I was mid-workout...if you buy these, I suggest you get the protection plan if they still offer it because I did not, so they will not replace the ones I purchased :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and good value
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. , Had a knee replacement and needed a set of ankle weights to help with the rehab, these fit the bill perfectly. Comfortable, good hook and loop attachments. Really helped with the straightening exercises.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Synor

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money. Buy the cheaper ones instead.. UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot worse than the cheaper ones I used to have. At first it's great but then the straps start cutting into my leg, even with pants on. With 3 light uses, the reflective coloring on the edges started wearing off. These were way too expensive for what you get. UPDATE 11/30 - Terrible. Used them twice in one week and my ankles were bleeding. The inside "tongue" that is supposed to protect your skin from getting cut up is too short. My ankles are only 7 inches in diameter. Today the black sand leaked out. TERRIBLE. I really wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It's comfortable and it wraps all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's comfortable and it wraps all the way around. Maybe because I have such small ankles. As a 31 year old I want to get in shape concerning my legs. So this feels just right.
customer_reviews.author: Arteest

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality
customer_reviews.text: Awful customer service . I sent an email with no response . A few months of wearing them for an hr at the gym just to do some weight lifting exercises and they fell apart and rusted . The seam also came undone and the little pellets came all out of the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Iv

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I’ve made. Use them every day, never had any issues. I also take very good care of my things and never throw them around, leave them in the sun, soaked, or even walk with them. I put them on and take them off as soon as I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice - well constructed and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The weights are comfortable and easy to strap onto my ankles and wrists. I'm using them for an exercise class and like that they don't take a lot of effort to put on and take off. I considered buying some weights that could be changed to add or subtract the weight, but I'm glad I bought these because it's the perfect amount of resistance for my purposes. Although I don't tend to walk outside at night, the reflective trim is a good safety feature that makes you more visible.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, poor stitching, leaks sand
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of these ankle weights. I had to return/exchange the first pair I ordered because stitching tore and came apart by the strap which resulted in sand leaking out. I got the second pair on January 19th. Today is February 21st and this second pair is leaking sand from where the stitching tore by the strap! To my surprise the return window closed February 18! So don’t waste your money on a product that will last about 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Momnochi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have to start off by saying that I put off buying these for quite awhile. I had a pair of weights several years ago and they were terrible! I wanted to wait to review until after wearing them for a bit. They are fantastic, very well made and perfectly balanced. They are comfortable, no scratching or slipping! I would recommend them highly!
customer_reviews.author: Emme

customer_reviews.title: Horrible chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell was so bad (kerosene? ether? gasoline?) when I opened the box they were shipped in. I put the weights outside thinking the smell might go away, but no, it is so strong.I put them outside and it went away eventually. But on the SECOND they I wore them (to walk) the filling started leaking. Returning....
customer_reviews.author: Wordchef

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last more than 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife for Christmas. They tore open the second time she used them. Sand spilled all over the gym and she was embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J.

customer_reviews.title: Fine as ankle weights and useless as wrist weights
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use as wrist weights -- I use heavier ankle weights. They really shouldn't be called wrist weights, because they don't work as wrist weights -- can't tighten them around any but gigantic wrists, and they slide around. I suppose they'd work fine as ankle weights, though, as long as your ankles are small enough that the weights overlap and the strap doesn't therefore cut into your skin. But even as ankle weights, these are a lot better:
customer_reviews.author: depscribe

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE IS KING!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised. Why I recommend this product is because of the company itself, or more specifically: their customer service. My band strap broke as a result of use (the stitching tore and began leaking). I contacted them with a picture of the defective stitching....they got back to me overnight and had a new pair shipped free of charge the same day. Rush delivery. Had a new pair in DAYS. Wonderful product with wonderful support!
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Fabric tore after 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Used for about four weeks and then one day after the Amazon return window closes, there’s a tear in the fabric and sand leaking everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great set of wrist/ankle weights!
customer_reviews.text: The last set of hand weights I owned unfortunately got ruined due to water damage which caused mold. So I was on the lookout for some new ones. Well, these wrist/ankle weights are perfect! So far, I have just tried them on my wrists and I love that they adjust so well for a small wrist like mine. I cannot wait to use these for my upcoming aerobic workouts, and I love the price of them, which is lower than the cost of my original, damaged weights.
customer_reviews.author: H. Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty well designed. They thought about one of the major paint points (literal pain points) about weights. Some wrist weights have sharp corners that end up acting as concentrated points of pressure from the weights. These weights don't have that issue so I'm able to wear them for much longer than some of the other wrist weights I have lying around. So overall I'm pretty happy with the product and I'd recommend it to anyone wanting to make their exercises more challenging with extra wrist weights.
customer_reviews.author: David Karapetyan

customer_reviews.title: ... weights for about a week now and am overall pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I have used these ankle weights for about a week now and am overall pleased with them. Them form well to the ankle and don't feel too bulky. They are a good size and easily transportable. My one "complaint" is the velcro: it's so sticky. It's a good thing when I sweat but when I want to take the weights off or even put them on, it can be annoyingly frustrating as the velcro sticks together so well. I also will that the band of velcro that attached was a different color so I could more easily locate the end in order to unpeel or readjust the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Nickel

customer_reviews.title: No more Cankles
customer_reviews.text: Great for toning muscles! I bought this a few years ago and they’re still holding up. I walk around with them doing house work, and then I follow it up with some simple floor stretches so you really get your toes relaxed. People don’t massage their feet enough. Let alone their toes. Having these two good weights around the ankles feel very comfortable, but massage them to get more blood circulated if you wear them for then 30 mins!
customer_reviews.author: Forever Filipina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, the 5 pound ankle weights are heavier than you would think. Being overzealous with my psychical prowess led me to purchasing the 5 pound weights. I quickly learned that I am not a professional athlete.... On a more serious note, these are useful for a variety of activities for all walks of life. The biggest thing that stood out to me about this product was the company that stood behind them; their customer support was amazing to work with when I had a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: With very little use these things started leaking little black beads all over. Bummed out. UPDATE: I bought another pair based on the good reviews and WTF, the second pair started leaking beads in the first hour! and the beads stained the carpet!!! WTF dude... I highly recommend staying far away from these things. IT WOULD BE ZERO STARS IF POSSIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnfyi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Weight for running
customer_reviews.text: I had thumb surgery so couldnt carry a dumb-bell while running, these fit the bill to just add a bit of a challenge to my run. They dont move too much on wrists, but if you over-tighten, they cut off circulation. Suspect the same would happen on ankles. Not bad for the money. The neoprene construction does make you sweat under them. They are soaked when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Scot W

customer_reviews.title: Will break open eventually
customer_reviews.text: I really liked using these weights until the stitching broke loose around the strap area and the pallets went everywhere I have brought them to a custom repair shop and it cost me $10 for each weight . Since I bought two pairs it’s $40. If you get these I would suggest getting it sewed all the way around before using it otherwise it will turn into a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do not close all the way like the picture shows because I don't have chicken ankles
customer_reviews.text: After I put them on and walk a little they turn and the buckle either rubs on the back of my heal or on the side of my ankle or up on the front of my foot on joint. I think there should be more padding up under the buckle to cushion it when it turns. They do not close all the way like the picture shows because I don't have chicken ankles. No cankles wither. Just normal ankles. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never paid so much for a paid of leg weights... but it was worth it!!! I am 5’2 , 118lbs and I can comfortably walk around in the 5lbs weights! They are easier to walk around in than my target 2.5lbs weights. Great purchase and def worth every penny !
customer_reviews.author: LegalJustice

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Absolute beautiful design. The ONLY ankle weights Ive come across thus far where the velcro strap does NOT rub up against the skin. I always just acceepted the velcro strap being as something irritating you just have suck up and deal with - not here. This is probably the fifth brand of ankle weights Ive tried and the absolute best in terms of comfort, esthetic and overall contour of it. They look cool too - but the comfort is most important to stay consistent in using ankle weights.
customer_reviews.author: S Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Like most ankle/wrist weights that straps-on using a metal ring, these have a tendency to dig-in on a single point like the Achilles tendon, becoming quite uncomfortable (and sometimes cutting-off blood flow, and requiring adjustment). What makes this particular product worse than the others is that the stitching breaks very easily, releasing all the gravel that gives them weight. In just a few months both have broken beyond repair. Very cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie T

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I found these! I love wearing ankle weights when I don't have time to exercise. These are soft and relatively small given that they weigh 5 lbs each. I can easily hide them under boot cut jeans or my yoga pants. I've had 5 lb weights in the past and they were either bulky or they were just uncomfortable due to iron weights inside or too hard and they would hurt my ankles. These are perfect! A+
customer_reviews.author: Mileseymom

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I really have no 'cons' with this item. I've been using them just as I walk around the house and up and down the stairs. They don't cause any trouble with rubbing on my ankle bones as I thought they might. They are too heavy for me to use on my arms atm--I'm 62, lol-- but I'm working my way up to it with some lesser weights. I would definitely recommend these to anyone, as my 30 yr old son tried them too and they also fit his ankles. Plus they look nice, just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: emarieu

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Ankle / Wrist Weights!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These weights function well for me. The velcro straps really keep the weights in place as I go through my weight training routine.I purchased the 3lb weights and use them around my wrist. They are very comfortable. I also notice the outer edges of the weights are lined with a reflective material which could be useful for power walking or running during twilight or evening hours.
customer_reviews.author: James Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Awful, overpriced junk - if  want you sand to explode on your floor after 4 uses - buy this crap
customer_reviews.text: Literally used 4 times. After which, the seam split covering my entire floor with sand. For the price of these compared to similar items, these are appalling. I've bought cheaper weights before that have lasted longer. Literally - FOUR uses and the seams split, and created a LARGE mess. AVOID. Or buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: love these for ballet conditioning
customer_reviews.text: so, i’m not supposed to use leg weights for it but i do, and my knees will pay for it later on. but right now, these weights are so good for doing floor barre and for doing developpes (ballet stuff, sorry). i use them to get some strength in my back. i NEVER run or jump in these unless they are on my arms and not my legs. that is unhealthy. but great product and very comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made product
customer_reviews.text: I have used ankle weights for an ab routine for years and these are the very best that I've ever had. All of the ones that I've had in the past were uncomfortable, the velcro didn't hold well and they would leak their contents. These new ones don't have any of those problems. The fabric is soft and comfortable. The design is smooth and not lumpy. The velcro is very strong and I don't think that it will ever start to slip. Over time the seams could start to loosen and leak the contents but for now that's no problem at all. I'm very satisfied with the ankle weights and consider them a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: agperry14

customer_reviews.title: A good value.
customer_reviews.text: They are as described. Additionally there is a reflective piping around the edge that I find useful as I walk a lot after dark. The only down side is that they are bulky. Using sand for weight is the reason for this but it is also why the price is so good. I am thinking about buying another pair with a more dense element providing weight so I can possibly hide them inside the sleeve of a jacket or shirt during the day.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company and product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s rare to see a company say “if you not satisfied with our product gives us a negative rating” it shows they want to improve their product. The weights are great! Awesome condition! Comes with a little bag for you to put them away 😄. Super comfortable and specially when working out. When it comes to the straps they are great and stick together really well secured. I would recommend buying from Nordic. Thank you for the awesome product and the great conditions! Hope you guys keep on progressing!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro O. Real

customer_reviews.title: Really with they didn't arrive with a hole in them...
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the best ankle weights I've ever used but they arrived with a hole in them and the sand filling is just slowly leaking all over my gym..
customer_reviews.author: Royce Jakob

customer_reviews.title: Leaking weights
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in 2017. Recently they have started leaking little black ball weights. I have only used them inside 2-3 times a week. I am torn as to whether I have gotten my money's worth since I have used them since 2017. It's just I thought they would have held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Indylindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Weights are a slim size for your ankle and have a nice reflective border if you were to wear while walking; however, some people may need to put the weight at their knee for therapy exercises and these would not work as the Velcro strap is not long enough for most people (I am 110# and it barely fit). The weights also have a strong odor which is decreasing as they are getting aired out.
customer_reviews.author: Bike, Run, Mom

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Ankle Weights but Quality Has Been Declining
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these leggings for comfort during work outs for the last 4 years. Over the last two years, the quality of these ankle weights are going down. The past two pairs have ripped within 2 months and tiny beads go everywhere in my apartment. Overall, they are my favorite ankle weights but I wish their quality would have stayed consistent through the years.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Florescu

customer_reviews.title: Fit great but leaking.
customer_reviews.text: 9/8/18 I added a star for good customer services. They contacted me quickly and replaced the weights. I haven’t checked the new ones yet so I don’t know how they compare. I probably got a defected one but this is leaking. I’m glad I tried them so early. I got them about a week ago but didn’t try them. I was wearing them around the house doing laundry and thought my sheets had sand in them. Otherwise they fit great. I’m going to have to return them though.
customer_reviews.author: Miss 876

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Velcro solid, fits comfortably on my ankles, recommend not wearing a fitness watch if using on your wrists, and it breathes fairly well. Solid product, works like it should. Customer service is good! They emailed me to see how the weights were working for me and if I had any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ankle weights I have tried. Comfortable and very durable, these have outlasted every other brand I've had by a factor of two or three. After two years of daily use my first pair is finally wearing out, and so I have ordered a replacement. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl R Fieldman

customer_reviews.title: What a let down
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed! Ive had these only 3 months i dont even use these that much & the stitching is already coming off. I picked one up to put it on & heard little gravel beads dropping all over the floor!!!! Ugh waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Sara Romero

customer_reviews.title: Stitching at strap loop fails
customer_reviews.text: These weights were great until the loop for the strap started to lose its stitching. Then all the little pebbles started falling out. The first one broke about 2 months into use. The second started it up just now. I’ve repaired them as well as I can but I’ll have to get something else soon. If not for that (major) issue, everything else was great. They stay put and are comfortable to work out with.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The quality is extremely poor on these weights. I wore them three times for walks between 1 and 3 miles and the seams opened on one set. There were tiny beads throughout my entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A workout without working out.
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to recover from an accident (a year ago) that makes it difficult to walk distances. As a result, I gained a lot of weight. Not only are these wrist weights helping me burn more calories, but I am developing shoulders like Charles Atlas.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and even worse customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These ankle weights began to wear down and the weighted beads on the inside started falling out shortly after I started using them. I contacted the seller asking if I could get a partial refund and would just try and mend the tear on my own. I never got a response from the seller. Poor customer service which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya S.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality - tore after a few wears
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these after having them for less than a month and only wearing them about 7 times. the clasp that the strap goes through ripped and the material inside started falling out. Luckily Amazon is amazing and refunded my money with no question. Buy a different product. :(
customer_reviews.author: RebaD

customer_reviews.title: They Hurt, but great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my last review: I have changed the stars from one to three for the excellent customer service. In my previous review I stated that these ankle weights wobble and hurt when I wear them. They are not comfortable at all. I have small ankles, and they just don’t work well for me. The company sought me out and offered me a full refund more than a year after purchasing! I’d say that is the best costumer service I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better for upper body
customer_reviews.text: Love these but if you wear them on your legs the strap and buckle will dig into your ankles which is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zwar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. They are comfortable to wear around my ankles and they are pretty secure once you put them on. They don't move around as some other ankle weights do. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: A Good Workout
customer_reviews.text: I put them on in the morning and walk around all day. The D rings coupled with the thick Velcro binders securely attaches the ankle weights without them coming lose or popping off. They feel like sandbag weights and not the bulking metal plates. Easy to put on and take off, without pinching my ankles. I just hope the Velcro lasts. Glad I bought these, stay away from the ankle weights touted by Big 5. They didn't last 3 months. Its a little premature to judge these, but I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Candel

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 86 year old father who is fighting hard to keep in shape and stay mobile. He has heavier ankle weights of another brand that are clunky and uncomfortable. He put these on and found them to be so comfortable he forgot they were on. He wears them while doing all of his exercises and loves them! He said these are like the professional ones he uses at therapy.
customer_reviews.author: JimG the Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible chemical odor!
customer_reviews.text: It smelled so strongly of chemicals that I had to return it. I wasn’t comfortable having it in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Kat T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these weights! Comfortable to wear on my wrists throughout my day- both at home and during classes at the gym. Easy to put on- and the strength of the adhesive keeps them secure. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: H. S. Wedekind

customer_reviews.title: Ankle Weights
customer_reviews.text: These are super helpful! I like working out with these. I use them on my ankles. Be aware that if you run with them, they will begin to dig into your skin. My suggestion is to wear some sort of wrap beneath them, double up on long socks, or make the heavy side face the back of your leg.
customer_reviews.author: Thegirlwiththeclover☘️

customer_reviews.title: Ankle/wrist Weights
customer_reviews.text: I received my ankle weights day before yesterday (3/9/19), used them yesterday and loved them. I am so happy to have them as they are help with my physical therapy. Thank you again for this wonderful product and I look forward to using my medicine ball when it arrives on Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated - They Rust if You Get Them Wet
customer_reviews.text: Nordic Lifting replaced these free of charge without any effort or expense on my part after learning of my issue - excellent service! I liked these at first. They were comfortable and looked good. I wore them on my wrists while running. They got wet from sweat, rusted and turned hard, and now they are impossible to wear. I washed them and they got worse. Don’t wash them and don’t get caught in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Rose

customer_reviews.title: " to be used for extensive periods of time without any wear or tear." is lie.
customer_reviews.text: "Reinforced stitching & an industrial strength Velcro strap allow these weights to be used for extensive periods of time without any wear or tear." This claim is incorrect. Stitches worn out in a less than 4 months and started dropping a black sand-like material. People who've designed the product either do not care or do not know physics or never assume the product will be used more than 2-3 times or all the above.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I only used this weights a few times and with the last used I noticed some black little balls falling all over the place. The seam from the weight had ripped. I asked for a replacement and they told me they were unable to do so. For a 5lb ankle weight the seams should be very sturdy and unfortunately these aren’t it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: Got to wear sock under it otherwise it rubbs your skin as you walk longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: I went to go use this the first time for jogging and wanted to strap it to my ankles as tightly as possibly. The threading around the loop securing the velcro tore loose and the sand filling came pouring out. I am a guy of average strength, there is no reason that going to secure it as tightly as needed for jogging should cause the threading to rip. Avoid this cheap product and get something of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful weights!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a set of these ankle weights for two years. Another family member wanted a set so I knew just what to get. They get regular use and have held up fantastically. Comfortable and durable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Greenbeans

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These ankle weights are just as described and have a very good velcro attachment that will not give from the weight itself. There is a great amount of padding, which makes these very comfortable to use. They also come with a storage/carrying bag that keep them handy and easy to transport. I highly receommend
customer_reviews.author: mjab87

customer_reviews.title: Thought these would be better than other versions of ankle weights out there but ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these for high knee and butt kick exercises to try and build up speed. Thought these would be better than other versions of ankle weights out there but the seam next to the buckles ripped on the very first day of use. Bought multiple pairs and multiple pairs ripped on first day. I have tried other types of ankle weights that have torn too but not on the first day of use. Extremely disappointed not to get more use from these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable weights
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable weights! I regularly work out with ankle weights on, and eventually they wear out and start leaking sand or lead. I bought these as a replacement for leaky weights. The way they are shaped helps make them comfortable. They have strong velcro straps. The real test will be how long they last before leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Wostambu

customer_reviews.title: fell apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my whole dance team and the stitching is falling apart and the beads are falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Msmith

customer_reviews.title: Great product but they smell awful!
customer_reviews.text: These smell awful when you first get them. After a few uses they (thankfully) lose their smell....whatever it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME wrist/ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was expecting if not more. The quality, look, feel and function were on point (if not higher than what I was expecting/looking for). These are exactly what I needed with helping with my weight lifting goals, and they do not hinder my movements/lifts in any way. Super comfortable and love the little carrying bag it comes with...makes it easy to carry around the gym floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lauralee Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and super soft in your skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, material, size and fit! The weight is evenly distributed. I was really worried that they would not be soft but they are extremely soft and comfortable!! There is an extra flap (black part on end) so the buckle or Velcro is not on your skin. So happy with them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: MAMA'S HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: This is second set of ankle weights for my wife. Had a 1# set and now a 2# set. Both easy to use and she wears them almost daily for walking and just working around the house. She is happy with both sets. In Texas, "If Mama ain't happy, ain't nobody happy!" Mama is happy here!
customer_reviews.author: Burney Cain

customer_reviews.title: It was no good product. My son used a couple of time
customer_reviews.text: It was no good product. My son used a couple of time, then it made a hole and leaked sands. Of course, returned requirement.
customer_reviews.author: Tomoaki Mizuno

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 5lb ankle weights for stretching and leg strengthening. I don’t intend to run in these, so I am not worried about the Negative reviews about these tearing easily. After using them several times so far, I have to say that they are very comfortable. I haven’t had them for long but I am definitely happy with my choice so far!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product in all respects!
customer_reviews.text: Well made product and will certainly fit virtually any size. Soft material and stays in place. I am using these as a supplement to straight leg lifts (hip flexion) in preparation for total knee replacement. Best to go into surgery with strong surrounding musculature such as the "Quads." Progressive exercise with these will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Klenk

customer_reviews.title: Post surgery recommended work out.
customer_reviews.text: The weights are as described in the ad. My wife had knee surgery and the physical therapist recommended she get the weights to do exercises on her own. The orthopedic surgeon was very happy with her progress today so the weight work is paying off.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Roach

customer_reviews.title: Small!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for these but unfortunately they’re too small? I don’t have large ankles? They are adjustable but then the weight is not distributed all the way around my ankle, which makes me worrisome of stressing out muscles or joints and also it’s uncomfortable. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Shults

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Fits snug and velcro stays in place. I use it regularly for strengthening mu arms and legs. I wish the manufacturer produced product in different/higher adjustable weights.
customer_reviews.author: Tibia

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried and returned several ankle weights until I found these. Unlike the other ones I have tried these are very comfortable and do not hurt. They also stay put. They may slide a little from time to time but that's normal since they're a little heavy. Very well made as well. Very happy to have found these.
customer_reviews.author: passerby

customer_reviews.title: They are of excellent quality and addition to your fitness equipment.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for keeping your legs in shape with a low impact effect. They fit nice around the ankle and are well made. Comfortable and secure, one of the best purchases in this quarantine environment.
customer_reviews.author: Mzster

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight and very soft material. Fits great and I have skinnier ankles so it's harder for me to find comfortable ankle weights that I can tighten enough to be sturdy for when I run, yet not scratch against my skin or squish my capillaries. This is definitely one of the best ankle weights I've used in the past few years!
customer_reviews.author: KateM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for occupational therapy
customer_reviews.text: My occupational therapist suggested I use a wrist weight for strengthening. The weights are easy to fasten around my wrist, and fit comfortably. The material and velcro straps are sturdy, no loose threads or snags. The weights are well made. They are perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F.

customer_reviews.title: Weight is not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Listing says "fully adjustable weight" but weight is a fixed 5 lb each. Adjustable may refer to the fact this product will fit differing sizes of wrists or ankles but the weight itself is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Two Wheels For Me

customer_reviews.title: Best ankle/wrist weights out there!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I am training for a marathon and use these as part of my daily excercises. I use the 1lb weights for running and my hi-intensity work outs. I use the 5lb weights for my hikes and the 1lbs for my wrists while hiking. I have tried 4 other kids and they never stayed on nor where they comfortable to wear. These are comfortable to wear. They stay on. They do not hurt to wear the. I highly recommend these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting and most comfy weights.
customer_reviews.text: They are the best and most comfortably fitting ankle weights. I prefer not having to insert single bars to increase weight. I like just having set of 2,3,5 pound weights. However I really want a set of 4 pound weights like these. Can’t find them by this company
customer_reviews.author: Tiger2

customer_reviews.title: good quality, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my dad who is needs them for his leg exercise. he was very happy with the product. he said it looks like a quality product and feels comfortable wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: dakbrar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Prompt delivery. High quality. Comfortable. Turn my walks into an upper body work out which is great... can feel my shoulders, neck, upper back as well as arms. These are the PERFECT solution to my concerns about walking vs swimming. I get arm and upper body exercise when I swim. But the spring weather is so great. SOLUTION: These wrist weights. I feel/see the difference the first time... in a week I am amazed at the strength I have built. Everyone needs these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasn’t sure that 5 lbs would be heavy enough to get a good workout brbI was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I thought 5 lbs wouldn’t be heavy enough to get a good workout but I was wrong. I love these ankle weights. They are perfect for achieving a complete leg/glutes workout at home or while traveling. Just search for ankle weight workout ideas on YouTube and you’re all set... and get ready to feel the burn while you are using them!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing the 5 pound weights during winter walks and hikes, with occasional sprints. They've helped to develop leg muscles for skiing. Still holding up well after 3 months. Reasonably comfortable when worn over socks or sweat pants.
customer_reviews.author: Z  Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Quality ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best ankle/wrist weights ever....and I have purchased several. The weights are evenly spaced so they don’t shift around on my legs, and the Velcro straps keep them securely in place. I highly recommend them! As a matter of fact, I’m buying a heavier set now.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Slips
customer_reviews.text: Slips down my ankle, doesn’t matter how tight i put it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Tear easily!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in great, bought them in May. I have used 3 times and today while working out, the Velcro ripped and all these brown beads spilled out all over the gym floor. Return window has passed. Would not recommend because they don’t seem to hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to put on. My wrist size is 5 1/2, and they just made it. These are much better than the other 5 lb. weights I have which fasten awkwardly and seem much harder, therefore less comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: aurore

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 2nd use. Beads everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: The service was good but the product, not to much. I also have 2 sets of different weights from the same company that hopefully will hold up for more than 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has low muscle strength and control on his arms and hands. We wear these on his upper arms for his Boys II gymnastics class. It has greatly helped him become stronger. Easy to use and the little bag keeps them together.
customer_reviews.author: NerdyMom850

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, easy to put on and they don't come loose. My only negative is that the velcro strap could have a tab or something on the end because they are sort of difficult to remove, think of trying to remove a very well stuck band aid, I kind of afraid that I am going to tear the velcro the when I pull it back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought one set to share with my husband. He won't share so I will have to get another pair for myself. He says they are really helping him work on his balance and rebuilding his leg muscles (post stroke).
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

product_meta.title: Ankle/Wrist Weights (1 Pair) for Women, Men and Kids - Fully Adjustable Weight for Arm, Hand & Leg - Best for Walking, Jogging, Gymnastics, Aerobics - 1 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: ANKLE / WRIST WEIGHTS: With included Carry Bag - by Premium Fitness Equipment brand Nordic Lifting™
COMFORTABLE & DURABLE: Designed for comfort and durability with reinforced stitching and neoprene padding
FULLY ADJUSTABLE & SAFE: Easily switch from ankle to wrist with a large Velcro pad - The weights even have a reflective trim which provides safety for outdoor use
A "MUST HAVE": For home workouts, walking, jogging, core training, Cross Training, aerobics, gym and many other fitness workouts
INCLUDED: 2x Ankle / Wrist Weights, 1x Carry Bag, Instructions Manual - With 1 Year Manufacturer's Warranty for Defects
